arm_group.arm_group_label: Reduction, Mastopexy No Implant, No Seri
arm_group.description: Patients undergoing reduction or mastopexy but no implant is used and no Seri support
Mastopexy with implant, No Seri support is used
Patients undergoing breast reduction with the use of Seri support
Augmentation Mastopexy patients where Seri Scaffold is placed

brief_summary.textblock:
Will the use of an FDA approved highly purified silk scaffold; Seri Surgical Scaffold help
      shape and hold the breast up on the chest preventing re-stretching and bottoming out of the
      breast in breast reduction or augmentation-mastopexy patients? The amount of stretch will be
      measured manually as well as percent of breast tissue measured with the Canfield Vectra 3-D
      Imaging system reporting the amount of breast tissue above and below the nipple level.

clinical_study.brief_title: Seri Surgical Scaffold Support of the Lower Pole of the Breast

detailed_description.textblock:
Patients having augmentation mastopexy or breast reduction will be informed about Seri
      Scaffold and allowed to have Seri support included in their surgery or not.  If the choose
      the scaffold will be placed under the skin in the lower pole of the breast as an internal
      hammock to help take weight off of the breast and potentially help prevent future stretch of
      the lower pole.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        Age =>18 years

          -  requesting procedure

          -  No active cancer or infection

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Known allergy to silk

          -  Pregnant or lactating

arm_group_label: Reduction, Mastopexy No Implant, No Seri
intervention.description: An FDA approved Bioabsorbable mesh Seri Surgical Scaffold will be utilized in the study as an internal hammock mesh support of the breast.

facility.name: Bengtson Center for Aesthetics and Plastic Surgery
Bengtson Center for Aesthetics and Plastic Surgery

clinical_study.official_title: Seri Surgical Scaffold (TM) Support of the Lower Pole of the Breasts in Augmentation Mastopexy or Breast Reduction Patients

primary_outcome.description: The Niplle to fold will be measured manually over time to 1 year
primary_outcome.measure: Nipple to Fold Measurement on Stretch

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014

secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of breast tissue above and below the horizontal plane of the nipple over time
